notes.title: Funding
notes.p: C.-H.L. has received PhD fellowship from the Canadian Network on Hepatitis C (CanHepC). CanHepC is funded by a joint initiative of the Canadian Institutes of Health Research (CIHR) (NHC-142832) and the Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC). This study is funded by the Ministry of Science and Technology of Taiwan (MOST107-2320-B-038-034-MY3 to L.-T.L.) and the MOST-CNR (National Research Council of Italy) Joint Research Project (MOST107-2911-I-038-501 and MOST108-2911-I-038-501 to L.-T.L. and E.T.).
